Bread bread can be used as a fire starter for outdoor cooking by shredding it into thin strips and placing it inside a fireplace.
Bread bread can be used as a weight to hold down papers or small objects such as batteries or electronic components.
Bread bread can be used as a mold for making decorative sculptures or bread art.
Bread bread can be used to create a homemade bird feeder by cutting into it and filling it with birdseed.
Bread bread can be used to create a natural exfoliating scrub for skin by grinding it into a fine powder and mixing with oil and sugar
